content: I ran into an ICE while testing a project on the 2021 edition beta, but since its an issue running under cargo doc and not cargo build and is specific to the 2021 edition I'm not entirely sure where to file the issue. Should I put the issue in the rust repo or in the cargo repo?
I assume it is a rustdoc issue. Invthat case the rust repo is the correct repo @Fluhzar [ze/zir || they/them].
Fluhzar [ze/zir || they/them] has marked this topic as resolved.
